bug.author: frytry
bug.summary: Tensorflow2.0 is not supporting this code
bug.description: Tensorflow2.0 is not supporting this tf.contrib.training.bucket_by_sequence_length and what can I use instead of this

comments.comment: Perhaps <denchmark-link:tf.data.experimental.bucket_by_sequence_length>tf.data.experimental.bucket_by_sequence_length</denchmark-link> can help? It might require some modification to use <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/data/Dataset>tf.data.Dataset</denchmark-link> .

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/frytry>@frytry</denchmark-link>
please let us know if the above comment helps.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/frytry>@frytry</denchmark-link>
could you please respond to the above comment

No it will not work. Both are different... Please check the documentation. <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
